disc:
Causes of DIC include
- Severe sepsis or infection: particularly gram-negative infections, malaria, Rickettsia infection
- Trauma: severe tissue injury, burns, fat embolism, heatstroke, surgery
- Severe inflammation: pancreatitis
- Malignancy: solid tumors, hematological malignancies
- Obstetrics causes: placental abruption, placenta previa, dead fetus, HELLP syndrome

Although diabetes may predispose a person to these conditions it directly does not cause DIC.
